  • **Pitched Battle GHB 2021** 2,000 (Chaos - Beasts of Chaos) [1,970pts]

    • Leader [915pts]

      • Dragon Ogor Shaggoth [185pts]

        Selections: 2. Hailstorm, Arcane Bolt, Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, Mutating Gnarlblade, Mystic Shield, Storm-wrought Axe, Sweeping Tail, Taloned Forelimbs

        Categories: CHAOS, HERO, MONSTER, BEASTS OF CHAOS, SHAGGOTH, DRAGON OGOR, THUNDERSCORN, WIZARD, Leader

        Command Trait: Mutating Gnarlblade, Magic: Dragon Ogor Shaggoth, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Hailstorm, Mystic Shield, Summon Lightning, Unit: Dragon Ogor Shaggoth, Unit Abilities: Beneath the Tempest, Weapon: Storm-wrought Axe, Sweeping Tail, Taloned Forelimbs


        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Mutating Gnarlblade Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. Add 2 to the Damage characteristic of that weapon. However, each unmodified hit roll of 1 for attacks made with that weapon inflicts 1 mortal wound upon the bearer after all of the bearer’s attacks have been made.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Dragon Ogor Shaggoth 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Summon Lightning
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Hailstorm 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 21" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, halve the Move characteristic of, and run and charge rolls for, that unit.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Summon Lightning 7If successfully cast, pick a friendly THUNDERSCORN unit wholly within 20" of the caster and visible to them. You can heal D3 wounds allocated to that unit. In addition, you can re-roll failed wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Dragon Ogor Shaggoth 8"1074+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Beneath the Tempest If the roll-off at the start of a battle round to determine who takes the first turn is a tie, roll a dice for each THUNDERSCORN unit on the battlefield. On a 4+ heal D3 wounds allocated to that unit
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Storm-wrought Axe Melee2"33+3+-13
        Sweeping Tail Melee3"D34+3+-1
        Taloned Forelimbs Melee1"23+3+-11

      • Grashrak Fellhoof [150pts]

        Selections: 4. Tendrils of Atrophy, Arcane Bolt, Battle Regiment - 0-2 Sub-Commander, Mystic Shield, Obsidian Blade, Savage Bolt

        Categories: HERO, WIZARD, GOR, BEASTS OF CHAOS, BRAYHERD, GREAT BRAY-SHAMAN, CHAOS, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Magic: Grashrak Fellhoof, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Savage Bolt, Tendrils of Atrophy, Unit: Grashrak Fellhoof, Unit Abilities: Infuse with Bestial Vigour, Weapon: Obsidian Blade


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Grashrak Fellhoof 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Savage Bolt
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Savage Bolt 7If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, until the end of your next combat phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target that unit.
        Tendrils of Atrophy 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from save rolls for attacks that target that unit.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Grashrak Fellhoof 6"566+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Infuse with Bestial Vigour At the start of your movement phase, add 3" to the Move characteristic of models in friendly BRAYHERD units wholly within 12" of any friendly GREAT BRAY-SHAMANS until the end of that phase.

        Obsidian Blade Melee1"13+3+-1D3

      • Great Bray-shaman [100pts]

        Selections: 3. Savage Dominion, Arcane Bolt, Battle Regiment - 0-2 Sub-Commander, Devolve, Fetish Staff, Mystic Shield

        Categories: HERO, WIZARD, GOR, BEASTS OF CHAOS, BRAYHERD, GREAT BRAY-SHAMAN, CHAOS, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader

        Magic: Great Bray-shaman, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Devolve, Mystic Shield, Savage Dominion, Unit: Great Bray-shaman, Unit Abilities: Infuse with Bestial Vigour, Weapon: Fetish Staff


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Great Bray-shaman 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Devolve
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Devolve 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them and not within 3" of any friendly units. Your opponent must move that unit up to 2D6" so that each model in the unit ends its move as close as possible to a model from the friendly unit that was closest to it at the start of the move.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Savage Dominion 518" If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy Monster that is within range and visible to the caster, and roll 2D6. If the roll is equal to or greater than that Monster’s Bravery characteristic, pick 1 other enemy unit within 3" of that Monster and roll a number of dice equal to that Monster’s Wounds characteristic. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Great Bray-shaman 6"566+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Infuse with Bestial Vigour At the start of your movement phase, add 3" to the Move characteristic of models in friendly BRAYHERD units wholly within 12" of any friendly GREAT BRAY-SHAMANS until the end of that phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Fetish Staff Melee2"14+3+-1D3

      • Slaves to Darkness Daemon Prince [210pts]

        Selections: Battle Regiment - 0-2 Sub-Commander, Hellforged Sword, Khorne, Malefic Talons

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, HERO, DAEMON PRINCE, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, Leader, KHORNE, NURGLE, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Command Abilities: Bloodslick Ground, Unit: Daemon Prince, Unit Abilities: Bounding Charge, Fly, Hellforged Sword, Immortal Champion, Weapon: Hellforged Sword, Malefic Talons


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Bloodslick Ground You can use this command ability in your hero phase if this model has the KHORNE keyword. If you do so, until your next hero phase, run and charge rolls made for enemy units within 18" of this model are halved. You cannot use this command ability more than once per turn.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Daemon Prince 12"8103+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bounding Charge Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this model if it charged in the same turn.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Hellforged Sword If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Hellforged Sword is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Immortal Champion This model fights at the start of the combat phase. This model cannot fight again in that phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Hellforged Sword Melee2"44+3+-1D3
        Malefic Talons Melee1"33+3+-2

      • Tzaangor Shaman [135pts]

        Selections: 6. Titanic Fury, Arcane Bolt, Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, General, Mystic Shield, Ritual Dagger, Staff of Change, Teeth and Horns, Unravelling Aura

        Categories: TZEENTCH, CHAOS, BRAYHERD, HERO, WIZARD, ARCANITE, BEASTS OF CHAOS, GOR, TZAANGOR SHAMAN, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, General

        Command Trait: Unravelling Aura, Magic: Tzaangor Shaman, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Boon of Mutation, Mystic Shield, Titanic Fury, Unit: Tzaangor Shaman, Unit Abilities: Fly, Sorcerous Elixir, Visions of the Future, Visions of the Past, Weapon: Ritual Dagger, Staff of Change, Teeth and Horns


        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Unravelling Aura This general can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD. If this general is already a WIZARD, they can attempt to unbind 1 additional spell in the enemy hero phase.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Tzaangor Shaman 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Boon of Mutation
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Boon of Mutation 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. For each model that is slain by mortal wounds inflicted by this spell, you can add 1 TZAANGOR model to an existing TZAANGOR unit in your army. If you do so, set up that TZAANGOR model within 1" of a friendly TZAANGOR unit that is within 12" of the caster. The model can only be set up within 3" of an enemy unit if the friendly unit was within 3" of that enemy unit before any models were added.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Titanic Fury 7If successfully cast, pick a friendly BEASTS OF CHAOS MONSTER within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that MONSTER’s melee weapons.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Tzaangor Shaman 16"665+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Sorcerous Elixir Once per battle, in your hero phase, this model can attempt to cast 1 extra spell. If it does so, you can re-roll the casting roll for that spell.
        Visions of the Future Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Arrows of Fate by friendly TZAANGOR SKYRIRE units wholly within 12" of any friendly TZAANGOR SHAMANS
        Visions of the Past Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Tzeentchian Spears and Vicious Beaks by friendly TZAANGOR ENLIGHTENED units wholly within 12" of any friendly TZAANGOR SHAMANS.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ritual Dagger Melee1"24+4+-1 1
        Staff of Change Melee2"14+3+-1D3
        Teeth and Horns Melee1"D34+3+-1D3

    • Battleline [875pts]

      • Tzaangors [175pts]

        Selections: 10 Tzaangors [175pts], Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Brayhorns, Icon Bearers, Savage Blade and Arcanite Shield, 4x Savage Greatblades, 2x Tzaangor Mutant, Vicious Beaks

        Categories: CHAOS, BRAYHERD, TZEENTCH, ARCANITE, BEASTS OF CHAOS, GOR, TZAANGORS, Other, Battleline

        Unit: Tzaangors, Unit Abilities: Arcanite Shield, Brayhorns, Destined Mayhem, Icon Bearers, Ornate Totems, Savagery Unleashed, Twistbray, Tzaangor Mutant, Weapon: Savage Blade, Savage Greatblade, Vicious Beak


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Tzaangors 6"255+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcanite Shield Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a unit that has any models armed with Arcanite Shields. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated. When you allocate wounds or mortal wounds to this unit, you must allocate them to a model armed with an Arcanite Shield if it is possible to do so.
        Brayhorns 1 in every 10 models in this unit can have a Brayhorn. A unit that includes any Brayhorns can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Destined Mayhem Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by this unit with melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly ARCANITE HEROES.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. While this unit has any Icon Bearers, it can use the Ornate Totems ability.
        Ornate Totems While this unit has 1 or more Icon Bearers, at the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of this unit that is visible to it. Roll 1 dice for each WIZARD that is within 9" of this unit. For each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Savagery Unleashed Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while it has 9 or more models.
        Twistbray 1 model in this unit can be a Twistbray. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with that model’s melee weapons.
        Tzaangor Mutant 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Tzaangor Mutant armed with a pair of Savage Blades and a Vicious Beak. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s pair of Savage Blades.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Savage Blade Melee1"24+4+-1
        Savage Greatblade Melee1"14+4+-12
        Vicious Beak Melee1"14+5+-1

      • Tzaangors [175pts]

        Selections: 10 Tzaangors [175pts], Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Brayhorns, Icon Bearers, Savage Blade and Arcanite Shield, 4x Savage Greatblades, 2x Tzaangor Mutant, Vicious Beaks

        Categories: CHAOS, BRAYHERD, TZEENTCH, ARCANITE, BEASTS OF CHAOS, GOR, TZAANGORS, Other, Battleline

        Unit: Tzaangors, Unit Abilities: Arcanite Shield, Brayhorns, Destined Mayhem, Icon Bearers, Ornate Totems, Savagery Unleashed, Twistbray, Tzaangor Mutant, Weapon: Savage Blade, Savage Greatblade, Vicious Beak


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Tzaangors 6"255+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcanite Shield Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a unit that has any models armed with Arcanite Shields. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated. When you allocate wounds or mortal wounds to this unit, you must allocate them to a model armed with an Arcanite Shield if it is possible to do so.
        Brayhorns 1 in every 10 models in this unit can have a Brayhorn. A unit that includes any Brayhorns can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Destined Mayhem Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by this unit with melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly ARCANITE HEROES.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. While this unit has any Icon Bearers, it can use the Ornate Totems ability.
        Ornate Totems While this unit has 1 or more Icon Bearers, at the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of this unit that is visible to it. Roll 1 dice for each WIZARD that is within 9" of this unit. For each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Savagery Unleashed Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while it has 9 or more models.
        Twistbray 1 model in this unit can be a Twistbray. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with that model’s melee weapons.
        Tzaangor Mutant 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Tzaangor Mutant armed with a pair of Savage Blades and a Vicious Beak. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s pair of Savage Blades.

    • Scenery

      • Herdstone

        Categories: SCENERY

        Unit Abilities: Entropic Lodestone, Impassable, Locus of Savagery


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Entropic Lodestone After this terrain feature is set up, its range is 6". At the start of each battle round after the first, its range is increased by 6".

        Subtract 1 from save rolls for attacks that target units within range of this terrain feature. This scenery rule has no effect on save rolls for attacks that target BEASTS OF CHAOS units.
        Impassable You cannot move a model over this terrain feature unless it can fly, and you cannot move a model onto this terrain feature or set up a model on this terrain feature (even if it can fly).
        Locus of Savagery Do not take battleshock tests for BEASTS OF CHAOS units wholly within range of this terrain feature (see the ‘Entropic Lodestone’ scenery rule).

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Beasts of Chaos

          Selections: Gavespawn

          Battle Trait: Bloodgorge, Brayherd Ambush, Creatures of the Storm, Gift of Morghur, Gor Battle Fury, Primordial Call, Raging Storm, The Herdstone, Warherd Charge, Command Abilities: Propagator of Devolution, Primordial Call Table: (01) 1 Chimera, (02) 1 Ghorgon, (03) 3 Tzaangor Skyfires, (04) Chaos Gargant, (05) 1 Cygor, (06) 10 Tzaangors, (07) 3 Bulgors, (08) 1 Jabberslythe, (09) 3 Dragon Ogors, (10) 3 Tzaangor Enilightened on Discs of Tzeentch, (11) 10 Bestigors, (12) 1 Cockatrice, (13) 3 Tzaangor Enlightened, (14) 5 Centigors, (15) 10 Chaos Warhounds, (16) 10 Gors, (17) 10 Ungor Raiders, (18) 1 Chaos Spawn, (19) 1 Tuskgor Chariot, (20) 1 Razorgor, (21) 10 Ungors


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Bloodgorge At the end of the combat phase, if any attacks made by a WARHERD unit in that combat phase destroyed any enemy units, heal D3 wounds allocated to that WARHERD unit.
        Brayherd Ambush Instead of setting up a BRAYHERD unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in ambush as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in ambush for each BEASTS OF CHAOS unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your first movement phase, you must set up all friendly reserve units that are in ambush on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units that cannot be set up are slain
        Creatures of the Storm At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. Each friendly THUNDERSCORN unit more than 3" from any enemy units can move a distance in inches equal to the roll, but cannot move within 3" of any enemy units.
        Gift of Morghur If a friendly GAVESPAWN HERO is slain, roll a dice before removing the model. On a 2+ one CHAOS SPAWN is added to your army. Set up the CHAOS SPAWN anywhere on the battlefield within 6" of the slain HERO. If the HERO had the KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH or TZEENTCH keyword, the same keyword must be chosen for the CHAOS SPAWN . If they did not, you cannot use the Cursed of the Dark Gods ability to choose a keyword for that CHAOS SPAWN .
        Gor Battle Fury You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly Gors units if they were reserve units in ambush and have been set up on the battlefield in the same turn. Broken Realms: Kragnos
        Primordial Call You can summon units of BEASTS OF CHAOS to the battlefield if you collect enough Primordial Call points. At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 Primordial Call point. In addition, in your hero phase you can choose one friendly BEASTS OF CHAOS HERO within 3" of the HERDSTONE you set up at the start of the battle and say that they will enact a savage blood ritual. If you do so, pick a friendly BEASTS OF CHAOS unit within 3" of the HERDSTONE. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. For each mortal wound inflicted on that unit, you receive 1 Primordial Call point. If you have 3 or more Primordial Call points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the following list onto the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of Primordial Call points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough Primordial Call points remaining to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of Primordial Call points you have available immediately after it has been set up.
        Raging Storm At the end of the combat phase, you can roll a dice for each friendly THUNDERSCORN unit that is on the battlefield. Add 2 to the roll if the THUNDERSCORN unit is a HERO or has more than 3 models. On a 4+, you can heal 1 wound allocated to that unit.

        Then, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of any friendly THUNDERSCORN units. Add 2 to the roll if any of those THUNDERSCORN units are HEROES or if there are more than 3 THUNDERSCORN models within 1" of that unit. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.        		 Broken Realms: Kragnos p134
        The Herdstone After territories have been chosen but before players begin to set up their armies, you can set up one HERDSTONE wholly within your territory, more than 12" from enemy territory and more than 1" from any other terrain features. If both players can set up a terrain feature in this manner, each player rolls a dice, rolling again in the case of a tie, and whoever rolls higher can choose the order in which the terrain features are set up.
        Warherd Charge After a friendly WARHERD unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that unit and roll a dice. Add 2 to the rol lif that WARHERD unit is a HERO or hs more than 3 models. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds at the end of the charge phase. Broken Realms: Kragnos
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Propagator of Devolution You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly GAVESPAWN unit wholly within 12" of a friendly GAVESPAWN CHAOS SPAWN. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons until the end of that phase.

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Dominating Presence

        Categories: Game Options

        Grand Strategy: Dominating Presence


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Dominating Presence When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are more units from your starting army on the battlefield than there are units from your opponent's starting army on the battlefield.

    • Malign Sorcery [70pts]

      • Endless Spell: Umbral Spellportal [70pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, ULGU, UMBRAL SPELLPORTAL, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Umbral Spellportal, Unit Abilities: Arcane Passage


        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Summon Umbral Spellportal 518"If successfully cast, set up the parts of the endless spell wholly within range of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcane Passage Once per turn, if a WIZARD successfully casts a spell within 1" of this endless spell, the range, visibility, and effect of that spell can be measured from this endless spell instead of the caster.

        In addition, once per turn, when a predatory endless spell within 6" of this endless spell is picked to move, the commanding player of that predatory endless spell can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again within 6" of the other part of this endless spell. A predatory endless spell set up in this manner does not count as having moved, but it cannot be picked to move again in the same phase.

Force Rules

Battle Tactics:
Broken Ranks: When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 Battleline unit from your opponent’s starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that unit was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.

Conquer: When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield that your opponent controls. You complete this battle tactic if you control that objective marker at the end of this turn.

Slay the Warlord: You complete this battle tactic if the model chosen to be your opponent’s general is slain during this turn. If that model was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.

Ferocious Advance: When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 3 different units from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if all of the units you picked run in the following movement phase and finish that run within 3” of each other. If all 3 of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.

Bring It Down!: When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 enemy MONSTER on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that enemy MONSTER was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.

Aggressive Expansion: When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 2 objective markers on the battlefield that are not wholly within your territory. You complete this battle tactic if you control both objective markers at the end of this turn.

Monstrous Takeover: When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 MONSTER from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that MONSTER is contesting an objective marker that you control at the end of this turn, and that objective marker is not contested by an enemy MONSTER.

Savage Spearhead: You complete this battle tactic if there are 2 or more units from your starting army wholly within your opponent’s territory at the end of this turn. If 2 or more of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.
